name: You can't see me (Legends-Games)
description:
this is a prototype of an idea

it was made for the kindred game jam but not submitted.

OF COURSE I AM NOT SATISFIED WITH THIS

this is about a boy who is afraid of the dark and its your job to get the light on  you are going on a search for the main switch you are going on a torch light so the view is limited, you need to collect batteries to progress levels and basically yeah that's the game.
